name: Bros2Hoes: Electric Hoegaloo
description:
Follow the sequel and epic conclusion to "Bros2Hoes"!

BROS2HOES comic here

Previously, our young prince uncovered the terrible secret behind the dashing new suitor: he's really an ugly green slob monster who turned the princes into hoes so he could marry them both and take over the kingdom!! What will come of this revelation? Will his plan succeed or will some wacky tf shenanigans happen? Find out now.

This comic is for adults. This is the 2nd part of a two part comic (First part in link above or in my store) All 25 color pages for just $5! The comic contains M2F TF/TG, Animal Tf,  inanimate TF, race change, bimbofication, quick change, and many more fun stuff! Cheers! :)
